context: Regional telecom provider facing network congestion and customer complaints, requiring major infrastructure upgrade to 5G capabilities

request.purpose: 5G network infrastructure upgrade across 12 major metropolitan areas
request.justification: Critical for maintaining competitive position and meeting growing data demands

decision_process.outcome: Identified 5G upgrade as optimal solution with 40% capacity increase
Approved project with phased implementation approach
Approved with performance milestones and KPIs

business_impact.expected_outcome: 50% increase in network capacity, 30% reduction in customer complaints, new 5G revenue streams
business_impact.projected_value: $120M in additional revenue over 5 years from new services and reduced churn

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Phase 1 40% complete, network performance improved 25%, early 5G services launched
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Phase 1 complete, Phase 2 60% complete, customer satisfaction up 35%, new revenue streams generating $12M annually
outcome_tracking.actual_roi: 65% of projected 5-year value achieved in first 15 months

lessons_learned: Phased approach mitigated execution risk, early regulatory engagement crucial, vendor partnerships improved implementation speed
